Example: This is the primary key for the data points
Provides the type of sport for which the campaign is created
Provides short description of the campaign which is present on the specific campaign page
Provides link which lets you jump to the campaign page (Unique)
Amount of money raised through campaign and stored as string with currency symbol

Description: Link to search type of sport
Example: Provides link to search all the campaigns for similar type of sport
How many users are supporting the campaign?

Description: Percentage of funds raised based on expected donation
Example: Percentage of expected donation which has been raised
City from where the campaign is being run
State from where the campaign is being run
Country from where the campaign is being run
Type of currency in which donations have been collected
Amount of donation (In currency type mentioned in variable "Currency")

Description: Adjusted amout of donation (In US dollars)
Example: Amount of donation in USD (Adjusted by conversion rates for different currencies)
